actions.name: Shackle
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Contact] attacks inflict Slowed 5. If a creature already has the Slowed Affliction they are instead inflicted with Stuck X and Bound X where X is equal to half their current Slowed Stacks rounded down.

system.description: Effect: The user's [Contact] attacks inflict Slowed 5. If a creature already has the Slowed Affliction they are instead inflicted with Stuck X and Bound X where X is equal to half their current Slowed Stacks rounded down.
